General.Name: Ching Feng Home Fashions Co Ltd
General.Description: Ching Feng Home Fashions Co.,Ltd engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of home decor products in Taiwan and internationally. It provides aluminum venetian, faux wood venetian, and vinyl venetian and vertical blinds; roman, pleated, and cellular shades; and coral fleece throws and blankets, flannel throws and blankets, faux fur throws, décor throws, and comforters. The company also offers decor pillows; and bath products, such as shower curtains and accessories. In addition, it provides beddings, table linens, cushions, and kitchen appliances. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Changhua, Taiwan.
